H0.text: What is the name for the act of murdering of one's own mother. Matriphagy

H1.text: What is the name for the act of murdering of one's own mother. Parenticide

H2.text: What is the name for the act of murdering of one's own mother. Filicide

H3.text: What is the name for the act of murdering of one's own mother. Matricide

A4.text: Matricide (or maternal homicide) is the act of killing one's own mother.
